issue.summary: Gene zgc:100980 is missing sequence resulting in a premature stop
issue.description: In clone CU855711.13 gene zgc:100980 is missing sequence in exon 17 resulting in a premature stop.
issue.resolution_text: The assembly of component CU855711 has been updated and the submission CU855711.14 now contains the missing C that was causing disruption to zgc:100980

issue.summary: Gene kif20bb is missing sequence resulting in a premature stop
issue.description: In clone CU607074.5 gene kif20bb is missing sequence in exon 8 (coding exon 7) resulting in a premature stop.
issue.resolution_text: CH1073-462F16 has been resubmitted resulting in an update to the accession CU611047.5. The switchpoint has also been changed to represent CU611047.5 in the reference assembly so that the alignment of kif20bb is complete.

issue.summary: gene in intron of gene fasn and duplicated clone
issue.description: CU137725.9 is nearly entirly covered by clones CR932358.4 and CR735103.4 except that clone CU137725.9 has a small gene in the first intron of the fasn gene.
issue.resolution_text: Component CU137725.9 has been removed from the TPF as haplotypically redundant under components CR932358.4 and CR735103.4

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components FP017228.4 and FP074869.4
issue.resolution_text: Strand sequencing data indicates that components from contig ctg10189 are in an incorrect orientation in the reference assembly. Therefore components FP017228.4 and FP074869.4 are not paired across a gap.

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between components CU607078.1 and CU611036.9
issue.resolution_text: Strand sequencing data indicates that components from contig ctg10189 are in an incorrect orientation in the reference assembly. Therefore components CU607078.1 and CU611036.9 are not paired across a gap.

issue.description: A gap in the chromosome exists between the telomere and component CU694280.16
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Can unplaced contig NW_003042377.2 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_003042377.2 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: Spanning end sequences place contig on chr12. The contig places in the gap between CT573006 and FP245468

issue.summary: Can unplaced contig NW_003336262.1 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.description: Can unplaced contig NW_003336262.1 be chromosomally placed in future genome assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: End sequence hits place contig NW_003336262.1 on chromosome 12 in the gap between CT573006.10 and FP236187.8 and will be retained for future genome assemblies.

issue.description: CU550704 was on chr.21 but BLAST'ing end seq's did not match anything. Not sure of placment so moved to Chr.U.
issue.resolution_text: End sequence alignments place component CU550704 .5 on chromosome 12 in the gap between components CT573006.10 and FP236187.8

issue.summary: There is a problen with the overlap between CR385054.19 and AL935114.8
issue.status_text: Annotation evidence suggests that the components CR385054.19 and AL935114.8 do not overlap and the similarities are due to a duplication in the region. A gap will be inserted in the TPF at this point.
issue.description: There is a problen with the overlap between CR385054.19 and AL935114.8
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Missing sequence in clone BX510364.11
issue.resolution_text: The submission BX510364.11 represented the full insert of clone CH211-81A17. The clone contained a 45kb deletion causing alignments problems with overlapping component CT030700.10 and partially duplicating the gene mpp7. The component has been resubmitted updating the accession to BX510364.12 removing the alignment problem with the overlapping component CT303700.10

issue.summary: ~20bp mismatch of clone sequence v cDNA/EST sequence over a splice site
issue.description: Mismatch of clone sequence v cDNA/EST sequence over a splice site
issue.resolution_text: Component CU929064.8 is no longer on the chr.12 reference TPF due to the clone containing a deletion. Clone CH73-80N9 has been selected as a replacement. Progress can be tracked in JIRA tickets ZG-3903 and ZG-3904.

issue.summary: Haplotypic overlap between clones BX005305.21 and CU855711.13
issue.description: Haplotypic overlap between clones BX005305.21 and CU855711.13, confirmed by cDNA - BC124715
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Haplotypic overlap between clones BX072532.7 and BX005305.21
issue.description: Haplotypic overlap between clones BX072532.7 and BX005305.21, confirmed by cDNA - BC159104.1
issue.resolution_text: A 2kb overlap at 100% identity exists between components BX072532.7 and BX005305.21. No change needs to be made to the alignment.

issue.description: In progress
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: High variation overlap between BX000980 and CT737148
issue.description: high variation overlap between clones BX000980 and CT737148
issue.resolution_text: BX000980 has received and acc.ver update to BX000980.14. This submission update changes the sequence length, removing the high variation join with overlapping component CT737148.7

issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components CR774192.15 and CU929359.10
issue.resolution_text: Phase 2 component FO704890.1 closes the gap in the TPF between components CR774192.15 and CU929359.10.

issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components BX276093.11 and CU468219.9
issue.resolution_text: A rearrangement in the TPF through optical map analysis (ZG-5908) means components BX276093.11 and CU468219.9 are no longer paired across a gap. New JIRA tickets will be raised to deal with the resultant gap problems.

issue.description: There is a gap in the chromosome between components BX323464.18 and BX294177.35
issue.resolution_text: A rearrangement in the TPF through optical map analysis (ZG-5908) means components BX322464.18 and BX294177.35 are no longer paired across a gap. New JIRA tickets will be raised to deal with the resultant gap problems.

issue.summary: Strand sequencing information indicates components in wrong orientation
issue.description: Strand sequencing information indicates that overlapping components from contig ctg10189 are in the wrong orientation in the reference assembly.
